section.p: The Medications section defines a patient's current medications and pertinent medication history. At a minimum, the currently active medications should be listed, with an entire medication history as an option, particularly when the summary document is used for comprehensive data export. The section may also include a patient's prescription history, and enables the determination of the source of a medication list (e.g. from a pharmacy system vs. from the patient).
